# Core Rule 9 - Bigotry is not permitted
Dont be racist, sexist, transphobic, or anything related. You know what I mean.
## Examples
### Permitted
### Not Permitted
- Harrassing someones character for being a woman - Harrassing someones character for being black - Harrassing someones character for wearing a trans cape. - Calling people variations of slurs, for example "ligger"
